actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Accounts.

official_title: To amend title 2, United States Code, to provide that an increase in the rate of pay for Members of Congress may not go into effect following a budget deficit in the preceding fiscal year.

summary.text: Deficit Accountability Act of 1992 - Amends Federal law to prohibit: (1) an increase in the salary of a Member of Congress from going into effect if the Director of the Office of Management and Budget (Director) has determined that there was a deficit for the preceding fiscal year; or (2) such an increase in salary from going into effect between enactment of this Act and the Director's initial such determination.

titles.title: To amend title 2, United States Code, to provide that an increase in the rate of pay for Members of Congress may not go into effect following a budget deficit in the preceding fiscal year.
